Package controller

Class Summary
AvailableItems<T extends ListedItem> A ListModel containing all the ListedItems of a given type that are available for use.
AvailableItems.AvailableIngredients A singleton class for static access to the list of all available ingredients.
AvailableItems.AvailableRecipes A singleton class for static access to the list of all available recipes.
DatabaseConnector A helper class for managing connections to the SQLite database.
DatabaseConnector.DBConst Constants of table and column names used for more flexibility in the database access code.
DatabaseConnector.DBConst.INGREDIENT_TABLE Constants for the table of ingredients.
DatabaseConnector.DBConst.RECIPE_INGREDIENT_JOINED_VIEW Constants for the view of combined values from all three tables.
DatabaseConnector.DBConst.RECIPE_INGREDIENT_RELATIONSHIP_TABLE Constants for the many-to-many relationship table between recipes and ingredients.
DatabaseConnector.DBConst.RECIPE_TABLE Constants for the table of recipes.
ResultSetParser<T> Helper classes which know how to parse some types of items from ResultSets.
ResultSetParser.IngredientParser A perser of Ingredients.
ResultSetParser.RecipeParser A parser of Recipes.
Sipper The main execution class of the program.
